oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Aerial view of reactor building and 3550 Building
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial view of a building complex with a single story building in the foreground, round structures on the left and a multistory building in the background.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 3550 Building; Clinton Laboratory; Nuclear reactors; Oak Ridge National Laboratory; Smokestacks; Storage tanks; Water towers
